Text: I can't wait for English release. I have grueled my way through a couple japanese games and I can't take it anymore. It's entirely too annoying. With quests being quite specific, how the hell can you guess at what you are supposed to do. One japanese game I had to drop a certain cooked fish on the ground in a certain place to make the boss appear. How the fuck could you figure that out by yourself? A forum helped me out a bit.
We want it in English!!! XD Though, that would require some English speaking company to buy the rights and translate it, right? :/ Meh, like that's gonna happen :(

Oh, and I do agree with Fernfrond - there's no point in playing the Japanese versen, except for the sheer joy of having a Fairy Tail game in your vicinity, but when that ecstasy wears off, you're pretty much down to nothing :/
